overview: Real Estate group buying Deals facilitate great discount rates through group deals on Real Estate Property. Groffr.com is the India’s Largest Website to provide great discounts on any verticals on group buy purchases.Groffr.com promotes group buying that offers great discounts in Real Estate Deals, Electronics Deals in Mumbai, Noida, Bangalore, Pune and in various other cities across India. Group Deals gives you great offers on anything ranging from Electronics, real estate or property deals, etc. GrOffr is derived from ‘GRoup OFFeR’ and our mission is to promote the concept of group buying which helps both the buyer (availing higher discounts) and the seller (inventory moves fast!) For more information, Kindly log on to www.groffr.com
